Counter-Strike Source.footnote: Online servers connect inconsistently. Mobile hotspot may fix issue.

GarrysMod.footnote: Game relies on missing Direct3D dll file.

Half-Life Alyx.footnote: Don't attempt to bring a VR set to class.

portal2.exe is blocked. This can be bypassed by enabling "Portal 2 Fix."

Online Multiplayer servers may be blocked.
